name: Which Breaks the Silence
description:
Clairvoyance is primarily derived from a deep understanding of reality mechanics, and the identification of the glyphs used by the dream to process said mechanics. It is consequently possible to predict reality by calculating the most likely results based on the present and incoming glyphs hidden in the layers of the dream.

If the glyphs are altered it will change reality in turn. While being highly dangerous to the inexperienced this technique is often used to skew fate towards a more favourable advantage, or not. 

Left click to advance dialogue.

Right click to advance dialogue quickly.
